snippet: Aleksandr Y. Lebedev, who for years has gotten away with tweaking the Russian president in public, said police and regulatory checks on his businesses had become so intense that he was giving up.
lead_paragraph: Aleksandr Y. Lebedev, who for years has gotten away with tweaking the Russian president in public, said police and regulatory checks on his businesses had become so intense that he was giving up.

headline.main: Aleksandr Y. Lebedev, Putin Critic, Plans to Sell His Russia-Based Assets
